Name: Huisheng science
Title: 治疗乳糖不耐 Treatment of lactose intolerance
Abstract: 我们计划使用肠道益生菌-E.coli Nissle 1917 表达β-半乳糖苷酶，并使其分泌到胞外，以降解肠道中的乳糖。其次，我们也将使用一种荚膜多糖（CAP），以保护工程菌在肠道中正常生长。另外，我们也将使用dCas9系统与QS系统，抑制工程菌的过度生长。最后，我们希望我们的工程菌能够为乳糖不耐患者带来福音。We plan to use an intestinal probiotic， E. coli Nissle 1917， to express β-galactosidase and have it secreted extracellularly to degrade lactose in the intestine. Secondly， we will also use capsular polysaccharide (CAP) to protect the engineered bacteria from normal growth in the intestine. In addition， we will also use the dCas9 system with the QS system to inhibit the overgrowth of the engineered bacteria. Finally， we hope that our engineered bacteria will be a boon to lactose intolerant patients.

Name: 北京大学
Title: 肽类EPI的定向进化 Directed Evolution of peptide EPI
Abstract: 细菌抗生素耐药性是世界面临的严重问题。据世卫组织预测，到2050年，抗生素耐药性每年将导致超过100万人死亡。抗生素的滥用很大程度上加快了这一危机的到来，而中国是抗生素滥用现象最严重的国家之一。细菌产生抗生素耐药性的机制很多，其中重要的一种是通过外排泵将药物分子排除细胞外从而获得抗药性。因此，外排泵抑制剂(EPI)也应运而生，成为了解决耐药性的一种方法。但现有的EPI面临着诸如作用谱狭窄、毒性大等诸多问题。我们的项目旨在利用酵母和细菌的共培养进化系统筛选、进化出高效、光谱、而且能够利用生物途径实现低成本生产的肽类EPI。Nowadays, the antibiotic crisis is more and more severe. There are now many ways to deal with the antibiotic crisis, one of which is EPI (Efflux Pump Inhibitors). We try to exploit the nutrition competition between yeast and E.coli to perform a directed evolution of a peptide EPI to make it more effective, cheaper and more safe.

Name: 北京化工大学生命科学与技术学院
Title: ACE.hair
Abstract: 我们，ACE.hair，从自身经历出发，认为脱发是值得关注的问题。经过调研，我们发现外在环境对头发的去留也起到关键性作用，在高压快节奏的时代，人们对头部皮肤的护理难免有所疏漏，然而现代营养学家正在呼吁人们重视头皮护理问题。 BUCT从最使人受脱发困扰的脂溢性脱发（AGA）中获得灵感，设计能够在头皮表面平衡油脂、分泌促毛囊生长因子并抑制有害菌群滋生的益生菌，同时致力于在减轻头皮环境恶劣问题造成脱发恶果的同时，改善其他皮脂过剩带来的脱发、异味等问题。希望我们的设计能缓解AGA人群的脱发困扰，同时其他存在头皮油脂分泌旺盛、瘙痒和脱屑情况的人群也可以尝试这种前所未有的“皮肤护理方法”。

Name: 北京理工大学
Title: 基于疼痛标志物检测的疼痛分类系统 Pain classification system based on biomarker detection
Abstract: 近年来，精准医疗、个体诊疗不断发展，疼痛也逐渐从病理转变成一种疾病。疼痛存在多种类型，针对不同的疼痛类型存在不同的治疗方法和手段，因此需要对疼痛类型进行检测与诊断。目前医生对患者疼痛的判断主要采用自我评定量表、行为观察量表和生理学方法，然而这些方法难以区分一些类型的疼痛且存在主观性较强的弊端。研究表明不同种类的疼痛关联着不同种类的表达异常的 生物标志物，此外，基于疼痛标志物的检测具有客观、准确和精确度高等优势，适用于解决上述问题。因此本项目构建了基于检测的疼痛分类系统，通过检测疼痛关联的疼痛标志物来区分不同类型的疼痛，以达到辅助医生诊断疼痛类型的目标。In recent years， with the continuous development of precision medicine and individual diagnosis and treatment， pain has gradually changed from a pathology to a disease. There are many types of pain， and there are different treatment methods and means for different types of pain. Therefore， it is necessary to detect and diagnose the types of pain. At present， doctors mainly use self-rating scales， behavioral observation scales and physiological methods to judge patients' pain. However， these methods are difficult to distinguish some types of pain and have disadvantages of strong subjectivity. Studies have shown that different types of pain are associated with different types of abnormally expressed biomarkers. In addition， the detection based on pain markers has the advantages of objectivity， accuracy and high precision， which is suitable for solving the above problems. Therefore， this project builds a detection-based pain classification system to distinguish different types of pain by detecting pain-related pain markers， so as to assist doctors in diagnosing pain types.

Name: 北京理工大学化学与化工学院
Title: 高下相成   Less Oxygen， More Possibilities
Abstract: 人工生物固氮、生物制氢被视作推动农业发展、应对能源危机的新途径，然而“氧气悖论”却制约着合成生物学的应用。因此，我们希望建立一种在介观体系中，维持局部低氧的系统生物方法。我们考虑动物、植物和短截血红蛋白等：在低氧情况下利用这些蛋白，将氧气定向转运到呼吸作用部位，而其他需要低氧环境的生理过程（如固氮、制氢）则不受影响；并可以考虑产生低氧响应后，激活荧光蛋白的合成。我们计划在模式菌株大肠杆菌中导入对氧浓度敏感的启动子，在目标外界氧浓度下该启动子激活耗氧元件，并保持对体系氧浓度的实时监测，以此来实现相对低氧环境的构建。通过玻璃体囊血红蛋白(VHb)提高在低氧环境下大肠杆菌摄取外界氧的能力，来维持低氧环境下模式菌株的正常生理活性。Artificial biological nitrogen fixation and hydrogen production are seen as new ways to promote agricultural development and address the energy crisis， but the "oxygen paradox" is limiting the application of synthetic biology. Therefore， we wish to develop a systems biology approach to maintain local hypoxia in mesoscopic systems. We consider animals， plants， and short-cut hemoglobins， among others: these proteins are used in hypoxic conditions to target oxygen to respiratory sites， while other physiological processes that require a hypoxic environment (e.g.， nitrogen fixation， hydrogen production) are not affected; and we can consider the activation of fluorescent protein synthesis in response to hypoxia. We plan to introduce an oxygen concentration-sensitive promoter in the model strain E. coli， which activates the oxygen-consuming element at the target external oxygen concentration and maintains real-time monitoring of the systemic oxygen concentration as a way to achieve the construction of a relatively hypoxic environment. The normal physiological activity of the model strain in the hypoxic environment is maintained by enhancing the ability of E. coli to take up external oxygen in the hypoxic environment through vitreous humor hemoglobin (VHb).

Name: 北京师范大学
Title: 大麻“疫苗”      Cannabis “Vaccines"
Abstract: 本项目采用消化道内定植菌株，表达降解酶达到对THC（大麻中主要精神活性成分）进行降解和转化的目的，从而降低大麻的成瘾性。并通过感应THC分泌色素改变达到警示的作用。本项目预计适用于缉毒警察、使用医用大麻的患者、去娱乐大麻许可国旅游的游客使用。

Name: 北京师范大学珠海校区
Title: 基于细菌纤维素的可降解皮肤再生支架系统    Biodegradable Skin Regeneration Scaffold System Based On Bacterial Cellulose
Abstract: 各种致伤因素所引起的皮肤组织缺损在临床上十分常见。大型伤口（如大面积烧伤、机械损伤等）依靠自身创缘的上皮和基底组织难以自行愈合。组织工程支架在皮肤创面修复上有极大的优势，细菌纤维素（BC）的优良性质使其具备作为优质组织工程支架的条件。但纤维素体内不可降解是目前制约其应用的一大问题，我们的项目旨在构建一个基于细菌纤维素的体内可降解的皮肤再生支架系统（BCAID）。BCAID分为基础BC生产模块、辅助愈合模块、蓝光光控启动BC降解模块、红光启动成纤维细胞自杀模块，四个模块构成整个功能完备、特性优良的BCAID。BCAID为BC组织工程支架真正应用于人体提供了一条基于合成生物学的解决办法，这对皮肤组织创面修复具有重要的意义。Skin tissue defects caused by various wound factors are very common clinically. Relying on the epithelium and basal tissue of their own wound margins， large wounds such as extensive burns and mechanical injuries are difficult to heal Tissue engineering scaffolds have great advantages in repairing skin wounds. The excellent properties of bacterial cellulose (BC) make it to be qualified as a high-quality tissue engineering scaffold. However， the non-biodegradable cellulose in vivo is a knotty problem that restricts its application at present. Our project aimed to build a biodegradable skin regeneration scaffold system (BCAID) based on bacterial cellulose. BCAID was divided into basic BC production module， auxiliary healing module， blue-light activated BC degradation module and red-light activated fibroblast suicide module. The four modules constitute the whole BCAID with complete functions and excellent characteristics. BCAID provides a solution in synthetic biology for the real application of BC tissue engineering scaffolds in human body， which is of great significance for repairing skin tissue wounds.

Name: 大连理工大学生物工程学院
Title: 基于高通量CRISPR基因编辑纯化系统的异丙醇合成优化
Abstract: 异丙醇在医药、消杀、电子清洁剂、航空石油、生物柴油等多个领域发挥重要作用。目前市面上使用的异丙醇合成方法大多为丙酮加氢法和丙烯水合法，但这两种化工方法的原料来自石油，且耗能高、易污染环境且催化剂昂贵，这些都限制了异丙醇的可持续生产发展。生物合成法因其污染低、节约能源等优点成为异丙醇合成的新兴方向，但其成本高、效率低、菌株耐受性低等问题也不容忽视。为此，我们试图重构全局代谢网络来设计构建异丙醇高效合成菌株。近年来高通量CRISPR基因编辑技术已被用于细胞工厂的搭建。大规模基因靶向位点、高通量基因编辑以及有效的基因型-表型定位策略可以用来异丙醇高效合成菌株的构建。但高通量CRISPR基因编辑技术仍然存在缺点，即不同靶向位点的编辑效率不稳定。所以我们希望构建一个高特异性的高通量CRISPR基因编辑策略以提高基因编辑效率。基于高通量CRISPR基因编辑技术，我们设计并构建了一个纯化系统，用于在大量细胞中去除未成功编辑的细胞，从而提高高通量基因编辑的整体效率，并减少未编辑的细胞对文库建设、选择和数据分析的影响。然后利用搭建好的高特异性高通量基因编辑方法对大肠杆菌全局转录因子进行半理性设计及高通量改造，结合高浓度异丙醇胁迫筛选，从而获得异丙醇高耐受及高产菌株。Isopropanol plays an essential role in medical treatments， disinfection，electronic cleaners， aviation oil， biodiesel and etc. At present， most organic-chemistry-based synthetic methods for isopropanol are acetone hydrogenation and propylene water method， whose raw materials come from petroleum. These materials production generally possess high energy consumption ratio，huge environmental pollution， and expensive catalyst costing. These problems highly limit the sustainable production of isopropanol industry.Nowadays， biosynthesis has become a new direction of isopropanol synthesis due to its advantages of low pollution and energy saving， while its problems like high cost， low efficiency and low strain tolerance are non-negligible. To this end， we sought to design and construct a high-isopropanol producing strain based on re-programing the global metabolic network in a short time. Recently， the high-throughput CRISPR-based genome engineering strategy has been used for cell factory construction. The large-scale gene targets， high-throughput gene editing， and efficient genotype-phenotype mapping strategy are suitable for developing the high-isopropanol producing strain.However， it still has weak points， that the editing efficiency in the different target sites are variable. Thus， we want to construct a high-specific and high-throughput CRISPR-based genome engineering strategy for the higher editing efficiency.By constructing such CRISPR-based genome engineering strategy， we designed and constructed a purification system to remove the cells without successful editing in hundreds of thousands of cells， thereby improving the overall efficiency of the high-throughput gene editing， and reducing the unedited cells’ influence to the library construction， selection and data analysis. Then， the library targeted on global regulations based on semi-rational design can be carried out by newly established highly-specific and high throughput CRISPR-based genome engineering strategy， in which the potential isopropanol tolerant and high-yielding strains will be obtained.

Name: 东北大学生命科学与健康学院
Title: RTAC蛋白的设计、表征以及应用延伸 Design， characterization and extended application of RTAC protein
Abstract: RTAC蛋白的设计、表征以及应用延伸背景：结直肠癌作为最高发的恶性肿瘤之一，严重威胁着人类健康。约全部结直肠癌中的10%是由RSPO过度表达所激活的Wnt通路所导致。RTAC设计与表征：我们采取抗体疗法的策略，通过阻碍RSPO蛋白与膜受体的结合来抑制由Wnt通路过度激活所致的结直肠癌。我们通过基因编辑创造了一种新型融合蛋白RTAC，其能够有效抑制全部四种RSPO亚型，从而靶向抑制结直肠癌发生发展。RTAC应用延伸：一方面，我们进一步使用新型血清蛋白纳米粒子，将RTAC修饰于粒子上，同时添加cRGD短肽使得RTAC靶向作用于肿瘤细胞与组织，提高其靶向效果。另一方面，我们构建工程酵母进行药物的定向释放。我们利用肿瘤微环境中的特征信号分子作为开关，重编程酵母mating通路，实现酵母在肿瘤部位进行药物定向释放。Design， characterization and extended application of RTAC proteinBackground:As one of the most frequently diagnosed malignant tumors， colorectal cancer (CRC) poses serious threat to human health. Approximately 10% of all colorectal cancers are caused by the hyperactivated Wnt pathway through RSPO overexpression.Design and characterization of RTAC:In this project， strategy of antibody therapy is adopted to inhibit CRC caused by overactivation of Wnt pathway via blocking the binding of RSPO protein to the membrane receptors. Through gene editing， we created a new fusion protein RTAC (RSPO-Targeting Anti-tumor Chimeric protein). And as a targeted therapy， RTAC can effectively inhibit all four RSPO subtypes and thus specifically inhibit the progression of RSPO-hyperactivated CRC.Extended application of RTAC:First， we further employed the novel serum albumin nanoparticles (NPs)， and modified the NPs with RTAC and cRGD peptides to allow RTAC to gain tumor cell/tissue targeting effect. On the other hand， we constructed engineering yeast to manipulate drug release.  Tumor microenvironment-specific signaling molecule is used as a switch to activate the mating pathway reprogrammed yeast to achieve tumor proximity release.

Name: 东北林业大学
Title: 极其高效的标准化 DNA 组装平台 以合成虾青素为例Extremely efficient standardized DNA assembly platform the synthesis of astaxanthin as an example
Abstract: 我们的项目是一种基于YeastFab的标准化DNA组装平台。生物合成涉及一系列的酶促反应，酶的量直接决定了目标产物的产量。但酶的量过少肯定是不可以的，但越多效果也不一定越好，而是达到特定的比例才能达到最佳的目标产物产量。我们DNA组装平台极其延伸出来的技术正是一个辅助快速寻找最优酶的量的比例的平台。YeastFab技术是一种标准化DNA组装的方法，我们在此基础上进行了上游的启动子设计和高通量的筛选方法的优化、机器学习（神经网络）的引入、全自动硬件设备的构建等一系列的技术创新。这是一个高效、简单、极易推广的DNA组装平台。Our project is a standardized DNA assembly platform based on YesastFab. Biosynthesis involves a series of enzymatic reactions， the amount of enzymes directly determines the yield of the target product. But too little amount of enzyme is certainly not possible， but the more the effect is not necessarily better， but to achieve a specific proportion to achieve the best target product yield. The technology that our DNA assembly platform is extremely extended is a platform that assists in the rapid search for the optimal proportion of enzymes. YeastFab technology is a standardized DNA assembly method， on the basis of which we have carried out a series of technological innovations such as upstream promoter design and high-throughput screening method optimization， the introduction of machine learning (neural network)， and the construction of fully automatic hardware devices. It is an efficient， simple， and highly generalizable DNA assembly platform.

Name: 多高中联队
Title: bacterial inhibition with TurboID（TurboID 对金黄色葡萄球菌的抑制）
Abstract: During community communications， we often hear about a pathogenic bacterium，  Staphylococcus aureus. Our main goal is to use protein proximity labeling to make S.aureus harmless within vivo. TurboID can catalyze biotin and ATP it carried to produce Biotinyl-5'-AMP， and label the lysine that are approximate to the active site. After labeling， the bacteria will not be able to activate the gene of virulence production. Such process can be accomplished within ten minutes in 25℃， which is the most efficient and reachable method by far. This method will not only be able to inhibit Staphylococcus aureus but it can also target other bacteria with further research.  Because protein proximity labeling requires ATP and biotin， so we chose to utilize engineered E. coli to produce what we needed. Since ATP in organisms are adequate， increasing the production of biotin became our main goal. We will put the artificially modified plasmid back into E. coli to express the target product so as to increase the biotin synthase and increase the biotin production. By using bioengineering， the cost of our product would be more affordable for the public. We are honored to a part of this science research with such influence as high school students; furthermore， we believe that the world could be benefited from our findings.在社区交流中，我们经常听说金黄色葡萄球菌的赫赫“威名”，这不由得引起了我们的极大关注和兴趣。我们的主要目标是利用特定的蛋白质标记技术，让金黄色葡萄球菌在生物体内无害化。我们将使用TurboID对生物素和ATP进行催化，形成biotin-5’-AMP。该产物将与临近内源蛋白的赖氨酸结合，从而进行生物素标记。标记后，该细菌将失去合成毒素的能力。此过程在25℃时十分钟内即可完成生物素标记，这目前看来是最优的做法。因TurboID有蛋白质封闭修饰的需求，我们需要获得更多ATP和生物素，因此我们认为可以使用工程化大肠杆菌来生产我们所需要的生物素和 ATP。由于 ATP 在生物体内已经绰绰有余，我们只需要增加生物素的产率即可。为此，我们将人为改造过的质粒放回大肠杆菌中让其表达目的产物，从而使生物素合成酶增加，进而增加生物素产量。我们很荣幸能以高中生的身份参加这样有影响力的科学研究，也相信我们的成果能给这个世界带来一些小小的改变。

Name: 福建农林大学生命科学学院
Title: 蛋白图书馆（Protein Library）
Abstract: 自2019年新冠爆发以来，人类流行病的防治，已经称为研究的热点。基于人体ACE2结构，FAFU团队针对如何产生一种和新冠spike蛋白更亲和的蛋白质或多肽展开项目。采用随机肽库和机器进化的方法，我们分别挑选了十种蛋白质，和几种20个AA的多肽，我们将这些产品应用于暴露在空气中的病毒的过滤以及早期疫情的预警。在人类社会实践的过程中，我们调查采访了疫情对当地农业、渔业、旅游业以及经济的影响，和疫情对当地大中小学以及群众日常生活的影响。Since the outbreak of the COVID-19 in 2019， the prevention and treatment of human epidemics has become a research hotspot.. Based on the human ACE2 structure， the FAFU team is working on a project to produce a protein or peptide that is more closely related to the NOVEL coronavirus spike protein. Using a random peptide library and machine evolution approach， we selected ten proteins and several 20 aa polypeptides， which we applied to the filtration of airborne viruses and early warning of outbreaks. In the process of human social practice， we investigated and interviewed the impact of the epidemic on local agriculture， fisheries and tourism， as well as the impact of the epidemic on local universities， schools and people.

Name: 海南大学
Title: 便携式、单碱基、无扩增CRISPR/Cas13&Cas14 核酸检测平台搭建及耐药菌检测中的应用(Construction of a portable， single-base， amplification-free CRISPR/CAS13 & CAS14 NUCLEIC ACID detection platform and its application in drug-resistant bacteria detection)
Abstract: 成簇的规则间隔的回文重复序列(Crispr)和与 Crispr 相关的操纵子(cas)为细菌和古细菌提供了抵御入侵噬菌体和其他外来核酸的后天免疫系统。从基因组工程应用中重新利用的强大和可编程的 Crispr/cas 系统的使用显着改善了用于精确鉴定的传统核酸检测，独立地使得能够快速诊断具有与肿瘤和微生物病原体相关的遗传和突变的多重生物标志物。基于 Crispr/cas 方法的大型生物传感器已经被研究人员开发和报道。然而，在这些检测方法中，我们发现 Crispr/cas 系统缺乏区分单链核酸单碱基差异的能力，这将限制 Crispr/cas 工具的广泛应用，特别是在存在与目标片段不同的单碱基突变序列或序列的情况下，将产生“错误”信号。为了克服这个问题，提高 Crispr/cas 方法的检测特异性，参考本项目中的 cas13和 cas14，我们提出了一个名为“枷锁”crispr/cas 工具的平台，并将其用于海南岛细菌中抗生素抗药性基因的检测。此外，基于我们的新平台的便携式核酸检测装置也在开发之中，旨在实现开发基于 Crispr/cas 方法的高精度和易于操作的核酸生物检测工具的目标。迄今为止，我们已经验证了我们的方法的可行性，收集了一些有用的数据，但是我们的平台仍然需要进一步的挑战来检测真实的样本，以及更多的时间来设计我们的便携式装置。Clustered regularly interspaced palindromic repeats (CRISPR) and a CRISPR-associated (cas) operon provide bacteria and archaea with adaptive immunity against invading phages and other foreign nucleic acids. The use of robust and programmable CRISPR/Cas systems， repurposed from genome-engineering applications has markedly improved traditional nucleic acid detection for precise identification， independently enabling rapid diagnostics of multiplex biomarker with genetic and mutation related to tumors， and microbial pathogens.  And vast biosensors based on CRISPR/Cas method have been developed and reported by researchers. However， among these detecting approaches， we found that CRISPR/Cas system lacking the ability of distinguish one-base difference of single-stranded nucleic acid， which would limit the wide application of  CRISPR/Cas tool， especially in conditions mutant sequences or sequences with one-base different with target fragment exist， ‘false’ signal would be generated. To overcome this issue and improve the sensing specificity of CRISPR/Cas method， refer to Cas13 and Cas14 in this project， we propose a platform named ‘Locking’ CRISPR/Cas tool， and use it for detection of antibiotic resistance genes among bacteria in Hainan island， China. Moreover， a portable device for sensing nuleic acids based on our new platform is also under development， aiming to achieve the goal of developing highly accurate and easy-to-operating tool based on CRISPR/Cas method for biosensing of nucleic acids.To date， we already validated the feasibility of our approach， collected some useful data， but our platform still need further challenge for detection of real samples， as well as more time for design our portable device.

Name: 湖北工业大学生物工程与食品学院
Title: Antioxidant Alchemy:  Cutting-edge synthesis of the potent antioxidant Ergothioneine 抗氧化炼金术：强效抗氧化剂麦角硫因的尖端合成
Abstract: Scientific research has shown that aging and diseases are mostly associated with the production of excess free radicals. Finding an effective way to scavenge free radicals is thought to be one of the most promising directions for food and cosmetic industries. To solve this problem， there is a growing interest in nutraceuticals and cosmetics containing antioxidants. Ergothioneine (EGT)， a natural antioxidant， which is commonly found in mushrooms， has fairly powerful properties. It has active effects on our health， like reducing cell oxidative damage， fighting inflammation， treating cancer， diabetes and cardiovascular diseases. However， human body cannot synthesize it directly， as a result， there is a huge market demand for the production of ergothioneine.This year， our main goal is to achieve higher production of EGT. Here， we engineered baker’s yeast Saccharomyces cerevisiae as a chassis for the production of EGT. In this process， we applied CRISPR-Cas9 technology to integrate two heterologous genes into the yeast genome， and succeeded in constructing EGT biosynthesis pathway in S.cerevisiae. The results showed that EGT can be detected both intracellularly and extracellularly in the engineered strain after 72h fermentation by means of high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC). Additionally， the production can be further improved after optimizing the media with proper concentration of amino acids， which is the precursor of EGT. This work offers a more sustainable， low cost and efficient approach for the industrial production of EGT.大量科学研究表明，衰老和疾病大多与过量自由基的积累有关。寻找清除自由基的有效方法是食品和化妆品行业大力研究的方向之一。为了解决这个问题，人们对含有抗氧化剂的保健品和化妆品越来越关注。麦角硫因 (EGT) 是一种天然抗氧化剂，常见于蘑菇中，具有相当强大的生物学功能。它对我们的健康有众多益处，如减少细胞氧化损伤、抗炎、抗癌、治疗糖尿病和心血管疾病。由于人体无法直接合成麦角硫因，因此其存在巨大的市场供应需求。今年，我们的主要目标是实现EGT 的高产。在这里，我们利用酵母酿酒作为生产 EGT 的生物底盘。在此过程中，我们应用CRISPR-Cas9技术将两个异源基因整合到酵母基因组中，并成功构建了S.cerevisiae的EGT生物合成途径。结果表明，我们的工程菌发酵72h后，里哟个高效液相色谱在细胞内和细胞外均可检测到EGT。此外，在优化培养基中加入适当浓度的氨基酸后，可以进一步提高产量。此项目为 EGT 的工业生产提供了一种更可持续、成本更低和更高效的方法。

Name: 华中农业大学
Title: C.V.D: Curer of Vessel Disease   C.V.D: 血管疾病治愈小能手
Abstract: 由于社会的高速发展，当下年轻人和老年人都存在十分严重的饮食不良情况。不健康的饮食会影响身体内低密度脂蛋白LDL水平、甘油三酯水平等进而导致高血压等系列心血管疾病的发生。我们希望通过改造大肠杆菌Nissle 1917，从两方面高效降低诱发血栓形成的重要因子TMAO（氧化三甲胺）的前体——TMA（三甲胺）的肠道含量：抑制TMA产生的同时降解已有的TMA物质，从而达到减少血栓形成的可能性；同时释放一些有益于血管保护的缓解物质。该项目旨在开发一种可食用的益生菌粉产品，期望用于不良饮食导致的心血管疾病患者治疗；为心血管疾病的治疗，提供了一种新的、低副作用高普适性的肠道药物治疗思路。Due to the rapid development of society， both young and old people have a very serious bad diet. An unhealthy diet will affect the level of low-density lipoprotein (LDL) and triglyceride in the body， which will lead to the occurrence of a series of cardiovascular diseases such as hypertension. We hope that by modifying Escherichia coli Nissle 1917， the intestinal content of TMA (trimethylamine)， the precursor of TMAO (trimethylamine oxide) and an important factor inducing thrombosis， can be efficiently reduced from two aspects: inhibiting the production of TMA and degrading the TMA already existed， so as to reduce the possibility of thrombosis. At the same time our engineered bacteria will also release some relief substances that are beneficial to vascular protection. The project aims to develop an edible probiotic powder， which is expected to be used for the treatment of patients with cardiovascular disease caused by poor diet. It provides a new idea for cardiovascular disease treatment by intestinal drug therapy of low side effect and high universality.

Name: 吉林大学化学学院
Title: Mood- Catcher 心灵捕手
Abstract: 现代生活往往压力巨大，很多年轻人因长期情感压抑而出现不少亚健康问题，我们的项目希望可以成为人们生活中的一个“清新剂”，通过摄像头和可穿戴设备识别人们当前的情绪，并让微生物生成与释放相应的化学物质以调节情绪，避免人们长期处于不良的情绪状态Modern life is often very stressful and many young people suffer from chronic emotional depression and sub-health problems. Our project aims to be a "freshener" in people's lives， using cameras and wearable devices to identify people's current emotions and allowing microorganisms to produce and release the appropriate chemicals to regulate their emotions and prevent them from being in a chronic emotional state.

Name: 吉林大学生命科学学院
Title: Coleader.zip
Abstract: 无论是在发达国家还是在发展中国家，重金属污染都是一种严重的环境问题。目前已有的化学降解法存在成本高，过程冗杂，回收效率不高，且有可能造成二次污染等问题。基于以上情况，今年Jilin China团队针对铜锌铅等离子致力于构建一种新型的工程菌，其功能集重金属离子感应和吸附降解于一体。通过特异性启动子构建的操纵子可以有效检测其浓度，通过表面展示系统将吸附蛋白悬挂于细胞表面，适时表达，达到吸附重金属离子的目的。利用这种材料，有望在将来更加彻底的解决日益严重的重金属离子污染问题。Heavy metal pollution is a serious environmental problem in both developed and developing countries. The existing chemical degradation methods have many problems， such as high cost， complicated process， low recovery efficiency and secondary pollution. Based on the above situation， this year， Jilin China team is committed to building a new type of engineering bacteria for copper， zinc and lead plasma， whose functions integrate heavy metal ion induction， adsorption and degradation. Operons constructed by specific promoters can effectively detect their concentration， and adsorbed proteins can be suspended on the cell surface through surface display system and expressed in time to achieve the purpose of adsorbed heavy metal ions. Using this material is expected to solve the increasingly serious problem of heavy metal ion pollution more thoroughly in the future.

Name: 江南大学
Title: 基于嗜酸喜温硫杆菌构建耐酸大肠杆菌底盘细胞 Construction of acid tolerant Escherichia coli chassis cells based on Acidithiobacillus caldus
Abstract: 我们在设计一种抗酸的大肠杆菌。我们通过嗜酸喜温硫杆菌的转录组学数据确定了耐酸基因 CFA，并通过一种穿梭质粒将 CFA 基因克隆到大肠杆菌中，或运用 CRISPR-Cas9 技术整合到宿主基因组上，得到抗酸的大肠杆 菌底盘细胞后，再通过构建启动子文库和相应的筛选，预测 pH 敏感型启动子来使底盘细胞的 耐酸性最大化，从而实现对大肠杆菌进行底盘改造。We are designing an acid-fast E. coli. The CFA gene was cloned into Escherichia coli through a shuttle plasmid， and the chaperone protein expressing CFA was cloned， and then integrated into the host genome by CRISPR-Cas9 technology， so as to realize the chassis modification of Escherichia coli.

Name: 昆山杜克大学
Title: GutGuard
Abstract: 本项目致力于探究胃肠道活菌缓释药物，解决现有志贺氏菌多疗程，易复发，且耐药性显著的问题。志贺氏菌是一种高传染性、肠内侵入性和偶有毒物释放的病原体，即使是10 - 100个微生物的低剂量，也可能导致结直肠黏膜严重感染和细菌性痢疾。本项目使用基因编辑的大肠杆菌和酵母菌作为活菌药物，使其表面携带人工抗体，从而靶向杀灭志贺氏菌。活菌药物适应性强，并且能够起到缓释作用，是我们选择这种方式的主要原因。Shigella is one of the most contagious pandemic diseases around the world that takes aways millions of deaths and severe diarrhea every year. To counteract the wide-spectrum antibiotic resistance developed by Shigella， we develop a novel treatment method using a surface display system in multiple probiotics. Antibodies that block the virulence factor on the Shigella cell membrane are displayed on the surface of the probiotics. The Shigella pathogens will be aggregated and become less virulent once they are “touched” by the probiotics.

Name: 兰州大学
Title: 利用编程益生菌系统靶向治疗结直肠癌
Abstract: 大概是吃铅吧 :P:[图片]大概是吃铅吧 :P:Colorectal cancer (CRC) is one of the most common malignancies， causing more than 9.6 million deaths in 2018， according to the WHO GLOBOCAN database. Current treatments for colorectal cancer include minimally invasive surgery， chemotherapy， radiation therapy， immunotherapy， etc.However， all of these have their challenges and limitations. The biggest challenge is the indiscriminate killing of normal cells. In addition， some chemotherapeutic agents can lead to the development of multidrug-resistant cells， which can have a range of adverse effects on the body. Therefore， it is essential to find safe and effective preventive or therapeutic strategies for CRC. The prevalence of probiotics in animals is important for maintaining homeostasis in the body. Microorganisms are also capable of being present in the tumor environment. In 2022， LZU-CHINA hopes to build specific engineered probiotics to treat colorectal cancer， enabling targeted tumor treatment with minimal harm to normal cells. The environment in which tumor cells live is usually characterized by high lactate concentration， low pH and low oxygen. LZU-CHINA team take advantage of this characteristic by introducing three promoters ， lactate operon， pCadC and pTeT， into the probiotic， equipping the strain with an automated tumor targeting system. In order to make the system stable and enhance the specificity of the engineered bacterium to kill tumor cells， we also added other genetic components including Amplifying genetic logic gate， adhesion factor， killing factor and lysis factor. 2022 LZU-CHINA is dedicated to provide new approaches and ideas for cancer therapy by synthetic biology through gene circuit optimization and construction.

Name: 兰州大学生命科学学院
Title: 重组益生菌减轻酒精诱导的急性肝损伤 Recombination Probiotics Reduce Acute Liver Injure Induced by Alcohol
Abstract: 酒精滥用会增加急性肝损伤的风险。大肠杆菌尼氏 1917(Escherichia Nissle 1917， 简称 EcN)已被广泛证明是一种安全的口服益生菌。本研究中，我们对表达乙醇脱 氢 酶基因、乙醛脱氢酶基因、NAD 合成酶基因和 NADH 氧化酶基因的 EcN 进行 了基因修饰。拟应用菌株在小鼠实验中，通过降低血清乙醇，并结合同未处理小 鼠的肝脏 AST、ALT、MDA、TG、T-CHO、TNF-α、IL-1β 水平，SOD 和 GSH 水平， 检测肝脏功能，同时检验氧化应激、脂质过氧化和炎症水平等。验证与酒精代谢 和酒精食物诱导的肝脏损伤相关的异常基因表达在接种 EcN 后是否得以恢复? 以及 EcN 赋予的功效伴随着肠道菌群稳态是否恢复?进而验证工程 EcN 是否可以 用于解毒酒精代谢产物在肝脏疾病模型?能够归因于肠道恢复?Alcohol abuse increases the risk of acute liver injury. Escherichia Nissle 1917(EcN) has been widely proven to be a safe oral probiotic. In the study， ecNs expressing ethanol dehydrogenase genes， aldehyde dehydrogenase genes， NAD synthase genes and NADH oxidase genes were genetically modified. In mice experiment， the strain was used to detect liver function， oxidative stress， lipid peroxidation and inflammation levels by reducing serum ethanol and combining with the levels of AST， ALT， MDA， TG， T-CHO， TNF-α， IL-1β， SOD and GSH in the liver of untreated mice. The project is to verify whether abnormal gene expression that is associated with alcohol metabolism and alcohol-induced liver injury is restored after EcN inoculation， also whether the benefits conferred by EcN are accompanied by recovery of intestinal microbiota homeostasis? Moreover， the study will verify whether engineering EcN can be used to detoxify alcohol metabolites in liver disease models， and can it be attributed to intestinal recovery.

Name: 兰州大学生命科学学院
Title: 工程化大肠杆菌使其在耐盐的基础上吸附 Cd2+
Abstract: 食品业和水产养殖业产生。对于高盐废水的区分，含 NaCl 30g/L 的废水一般被称为高盐废水，含 NaCl 70g/L 的废水则被称为超高盐废水。以化工废水为例，其出水水质复杂且污染物含量高，废水中污染物大都含有剧毒，如重金属铅、镉等。这些金属可以到达食物链，威胁到人类和其他生物体的健康。其中毒性最大的为CdCl2，当质量浓度为 0.001 mg/L 时，对鱼类和水生生物就能产生致死作用。水中镉质量浓度为 0.1 mg/L 时，就可抑制水体自净作用。基于合成生物学的方法，构建工程菌 R-E/irrE，EC20 作为一种植物螯合肽类似物，有报道称其具有重金属吸附能力，基于细胞表面展示技术使EC20 锚定在大肠杆菌表面，去尝试吸附重金属 Cd2+。Food industry and aquaculture. For the distinction of high salt wastewater， wastewater containing 30g/l NaCl is generally called high salt wastewater， and wastewater containing 70g/l NaCl is called ultra-high salt wastewater. Taking chemical wastewater as an example， its effluent quality is complex and the content of pollutants is high. Most of the pollutants in the wastewater contain highly toxic， such as heavy metals lead， cadmium and so on. These metals can reach the food chain and threaten the health of humans and other organisms. Among them， the most toxic is CdCl2. When the mass concentration is 0.001 mg/l， it can have a lethal effect on fish and aquatic organisms. When the mass concentration of cadmium in water is 0.1 mg / L， the self purification of water can be inhibited. Based on the method of synthetic biology， the engineering bacterium r-e/irre was constructed. EC20， as a plant chelating peptide analogue， was reported to have the ability to adsorb heavy metals. Based on the cell surface display technology， EC20 was anchored on the surface of E. coli to try to adsorb heavy metal cd2+.

Name: 兰州大学生命科学学院
Title: 《提高几丁质酶抗真菌能力来治疗由真菌引起的人体皮肤病》  《To improve the anti-fungal ability of chitinase to treat human dermatomycoses》
Abstract: 几丁质酶被现在认为是理想的抗真菌药物，但因为几丁质酶的活性弱，它不可以完全抑制住几丁质在细胞壁中的合成。在这种情况下，我们如果要去提高几丁质酶的抗真菌能力，让它完全抑制住几丁质的合成，我们需要去提高几丁质酶的催化活性。我们发现，几丁质酶活性低的原因是因为缺少几丁质结合域，于是在几丁质的两端加上结构域，通过两端融合表达几丁质结合结构域可以增强几丁质酶与底物的结合，可以提升几丁质酶的活性，从而提升几丁质酶的抗真菌能力，防止真菌引起的人体皮肤病。Chitinase is now considered as an ideal antifungal agent， but due to its weak activity， it cannot completely inhibit the synthesis of chitin in the cell wall. In this case， if we want to improve the anti-fungal ability of chitinase and make it completely inhibit the synthesis of chitin， we need to improve the catalytic activity of chitinase. We found that the chitinase activity is low because of lack of chitin in combination with the domain， and so on both ends of chitin qualitative combined with domain structure， through both ends fusion expression chitin combined with domain structure can enhance the combination of chitinase and the substrate， can promote the activity of chitinase， by raising the chitinase antifungal capability， prevent fungal skin disease caused by the human body.

Name: 兰州大学生命科学学院
Title: Cu传感器
Abstract: Then the linking reaction was carried out， the linked products were stored at minus 20 degrees Celsius， ambenzyl antibiotics were cloned， and the target fragment was transformed into the successful DH5 alpha fragment. Half of the colony was selected to make the template， and finally an experiment of transformation was carried out.

Name: 兰州大学生命科学院
Title: 关于自主合成5-HTP和GABA菌株的抑郁症疗法  Treatment of depression by autonomic synthesis of 5-HTP and GABA strains
Abstract: 肠道由1亿个神经细胞所包围，其所拥有的神经细胞数量仅次于中枢神经，这个神经网络被称为肠神经系统。近些年来，很多科学家发现肠道菌群通过一种肠脑轴来影响机体的大脑结构以及相关疾病的发生，比如阿尔兹海默症、抑郁症等。某些肠道微生物会影响一个人的情绪状态。化学物质5-HTP 通过增加血清素的产生在大脑和中枢神经系统中起作用。化学物质GABA是一种氨基酸，对于保持健康和保持身体系统正常运作非常重要。其主要工作是作为抑制性神经递质工作，这意味着它阻断神经细胞与大脑或脊髓之间发送的信息，防止神经元的刺激起作用。这导致在此过程中接收消息的神经元不会对它起作用，因此消息不会发送到其他神经元。本项目主要研究自主生产人体肠道微⽣物5-HTP和GABA的菌株，并摄⼊益⽣菌，调节⼈体肠道菌群平衡，从肠脑轴的⻆度帮组抑郁症群体恢复。同时本项目也会研究菌株自杀系统，防止造成转基因污染。 Our intestine is surrounded by approximately 100 million nerve cells， which is second only to the number of nerve cells in our central nervous system. This neural network is known as the enteric nervous system. In recent years， many scientists have discovered that intestinal microbiota affects the brain structure of the body and the occurrence of related diseases， such as Alzheimer's disease and depression through a kind of gut-brain axis. Certain intestinal microorganisms can affect a person's emotional state. The chemical 5-HTP acts in the brain and central nervous system by increasing the production of

Name: 兰州大学生命科学院
Title: 生物合成降尿酸益生菌/Biosynthetic probiotics for uric acid lowering therapy
Abstract:
尿酸，C5H4N4O，是人体嘌呤碱分解代谢的终产物。在代谢异常的情况下，高尿酸会导致由尿酸盐结石而引起的痛风，以及高血压，慢性肾病等一系列并发症。近年来，国内外痛风的发病率显著升高，我国尿酸血症呈明显和年轻化趋势。中国高尿酸血症总体患病率为13.3%，也就是约1.77亿。尿酸高已成为影响国民健康的一项不可轻视的问题。传统的降尿酸思路有以下两种：通过药物别嘌醇来抑制⻩嘌呤氧化酶以减少尿酸的生成，或是通过丙磺舒、苯磺唑酮和苯溴⻢⻰等药物来促进药酸在肾脏的排泄。据调查，前者可能导致过敏性皮炎，药物热等不良反应（约在10%-15%的使用者身上出现），而后者多因为患者存在大量痛⻛石或肾功能不全而不适合使用。高尿酸患者迫切需要一种无副作用，更安全的治疗方法。我们的课题将引入外源性尿酸酶作为新思路，使用分子克隆技术在大肠杆菌中插入编码尿酸氧化酶的基因，被编辑的益生菌被添加在酸奶与冻干粉之类的食物被患者摄入。这种治疗方法不涉及以上提到的副作用，且有一系列的优点：与其他药的时效性不同，大肠杆菌会在肠道中持续释放尿酸氧化酶，且肠道菌群微生态对人体健康起到积极的长期调控作用。其次，产生的尿酸可以在肠道里直接被分解，不涉及药物的吸收与在体内的代谢。尿酸沿着浓度梯度作分子扩散运动，即血液里的尿酸可倒流进肠道，直接进行分解。Uric acid, with a chemical formula of C5H4N4O, is an end-product of purine catabolism in the human body. In cases of abnormal metabolism, high uric acid levels can lead to gout caused by urate stones, as well as a series of other complications such as hypertension and chronic kidney disease. In recent years, incidences of gout within China and abroad have increased significantly, with a clear trend of uricemia diagnosis being demonstrated among younger generations. The prevalence of hyperuricemia stands at 13.3% in China, with nearly 177 million individuals diagnosed with this condition. In other words, hyperuricemia has become a significant factor affecting national health, and simply cannot be ignored.

The two traditional treatments aimed towards lowering uric acid levels involve the usage of allopurinol to inhibit xanthine oxidase and subsequent uric acid production, as well as the utilization of probenecid, sulfinpyrazone, or benzyl bromide to promote the excretion of medicinal acids within the kidneys. According to research, the former treatment method can lead to adverse effects such as allergic dermatitis and drug fever (affecting 10%-15% of users), while the latter treatment method can prove unsuitable for use due to heavy presence of pain stones or renal insufficiency within patients. The development of a safer treatment method without side effects for patients diagnosed with hyperuricemia is urgently needed.

Our project introduces exogenous uricase as a new treatment method, where we utilize molecular cloning technologies to insert the gene encoding for urate oxidase into Esherichia coli, while subsequently incorporating the modified probiotics into edibles such as yogurt and freeze-dried powder. This treatment method will not produce any of the side effects mentioned above. In fact, a series of advantages and benefits is associated with this method. First, unlike other drugs, our modified Escherichia coli will continuously release urate oxidase within the intestines, and the intestinal flora microecology will play a positive, long-term role in regulating human health. Second, the production of uric acid within the intestines can be directly decomposed without the involvement of drug absorption and metabolism within the body. It performs molecular diffusion along its concentration gradient, where uric acid within the blood stream can flow back into the intestines and undergo direct decomposition.

Name: 美国维理达斯学校
Title: Degradation Regulator 降解调节器
Abstract: In the field of synthetic biology， enhancing gene expression is vital for downstream applications such as biosynthesis of valuable chemicals or signal changes and behaviors of designed gene circuits against intrinsic noise in biological systems. One widely used way to express more gene products is adopting stronger promoter or ribosome binding sites (RBS) to increase the inflow of mRNA and protein translation. However， this approach inevitably increases metabolic pressure for the chassis and limits the scale and complexity of artificial biological circuits， because the burden imposed by an advanced network with enhanced gene expression would lead to the low growth rate or inviability of the host organism. On the other hand， the steady-state concentration of mRNA depends on its production rate and degradation rate according to the standard mathematical model of gene expression dynamics. As the degradation rate is significant in prokaryotes with a half-life of fewer than 30 minutes， the ability to tune their degradation dynamics would have a huge effect on the production of downstream products. Instead of increasing the production rate of gene products， we seek to modulate the degradation rate of mRNA by making use of degradation-tuning RNAs (dtRNAs) on the 5’ UTR region of the mRNAs， which promote or inhibit the attack from endogenous RNases. This allows us to enhance protein expressions without posting an extra metabolic burden to the host， modulating the dynamics of gene circuits by changing degradation rate constants， and regulating non-coding RNA functionalities. The standardized biological parts form of dtRNAs would facilitate its integration into existing gene circuits and accelerates the construction of novel biomolecular reaction networks with tunable parameters and increased complexity. 在合成生物学领域，增强基因表达对下游应用至关重要，如有价值的化学物质的生物合成或设计的基因电路的信号变化和行为，以对抗生物系统中的固有噪声。采用更强的启动子或核糖体结合位点(RBS)来增加mRNA的流入和蛋白质翻译是表达更多基因产物的一种广泛应用的方法。然而，这种方法不可避免地增加了底盘的代谢压力，限制了人工生物回路的规模和复杂性，因为基因表达增强的先进网络带来的负担会导致宿主生物的低生长速度或不生存。另一方面，根据基因表达动力学的标准数学模型，mRNA的稳态浓度取决于其产生速率和降解速率。在半衰期小于30分钟的原核生物中，降解速率非常显著，因此调整其降解动态的能力将对下游产品的生产产生巨大影响。我们试图通过利用mRNA 5 ' UTR区域上的降解调控RNA (dtRNAs)来调节mRNA的降解速率，而不是增加基因产物的产生速度，这可以促进或抑制内源性RNase的攻击。这使得我们能够在不增加宿主额外代谢负担的情况下增强蛋白质表达、通过改变降解速率常数来调节基因回路的动态、以及调节非编码RNA的功能。标准化的生物部分形式的dtRNAs将有助于其整合到现有的基因电路中，并加速参数可调和复杂性增加的新型生物分子反应网络的构建。

Name: 南方科技大学生命科学学院
Title: 使用定向进化优化大肠杆菌生产骨螺紫 Using directed evolution to simplify the production of tyrian purple in E. coli
Abstract:
我们希望利用Trp 6-卤素酶(Trp 6-Hal)、色氨酸酶(TnaA)和单加氧酶(MO)的反应方案，根据《Nature Chemical Biology》和iGEM团队LINKS_China的研究成果，开发合成骨螺紫的方法。由于TnaA可以同时识别和反应色氨酸和第一步产物溴色氨酸，Lee等人设计了双细胞系统来解决最终产品骨螺紫中携带大量副产物靛蓝的问题。为了生产副产物靛蓝较少的骨螺紫，Fre-SttH和TnaA必须在两个不同的菌株中，所以Lee和LINKS_China都使用了一个不表达内源性TnaA的ΔTnaA大肠杆菌菌株和一个表达额外TnaA的ΔTnaA大肠杆菌菌株。今年我们将双细胞生产系统优化为单细胞系统。我们开发了一种具有定向进化策略的可编程色氨酸抑制子合成系统，以简化与溴色氨酸而非色氨酸反应的过程。对于定向进化策略，我们采用了compartmentalized partnered replication(CPR)。重复的正负CPR导致了对卤化色氨酸类似物和新操作位点具有高亲和力和特异性的变异体实现指数扩增。我们使细胞能够感知环境中溴色氨酸与色氨酸的相对比例，从而控制TnaA的合成，这将有利于骨螺紫的产生，并减少靛蓝副产物。
We want to develop tyrian purple production by reaction schemes of Trp 6-halogenase (Trp 6-Hal), tryptophanase (TnaA) and monooxygenase (MO) based on work of the publication on Nature Chemical Biology and a iGEM team LINKS_China. Two-cell system is designed by Lee et al as a solution to the basic problem of byproduct indigo produced in our final product tyrian purple, due to TnaA can identify and react with both Trp and the first step product Br-Trp. For producing tyrian purple with less byproduct indigo, Fre-SttH and TnaA has to be in two different strains, so Lee and LINKS_China both used a ΔTnaA E. coli strain without endogenous TnaA expression and another ΔTnaA E. coli strain with extra TnaA expression. This year we optimize the two-cell production system to one-cell system. We develop a synthetic phylogeny of programmable Trp repressor with directed evolution strategy to simplify the process of reacting with Br-Trp not Trp. For the strategy of directed evolution, we use compartmentalized partnered replication (CPR). Iterative rounds of positive and negative compartmentalized partnered replication (CPR) led to the exponential amplification of variants that responded with high affinity and specificity to halogenated tryptophan analogs and novel operator sites. We empower cells to perceive the relative ratio of bromotryptophan to tryptophan in the environment to control TnaA synthesis, which will benefit tyrian purple production with less indigo byproduct.

Name: 南京大学生命科学学院
Title: 基因工程外泌体治疗雄性激素脱发的研究（Treatment of alopecia by genetically engineered exosomes）
Abstract: NJU-China项目简介：脱发是一种困扰着广大人群的皮肤疾病，影响患者的容貌并带去焦虑、压力等不良情绪。NJU-China团队着眼于发病率最高的雄性激素脱发，探索其致病机制，寻找多个基因靶点，使用RNAi技术、mRNA搭载元件调节特定基因表达；以外泌体为载体，包埋药物(siRNA、mRNA)并通过微针透皮抵达毛囊细胞实现治疗。同时，该项目意在通过对雄性激素脱发的药物研究，借助外泌体生物相容性高、提升包埋药物稳定性的特性，开发一套“外泌体+微针”的皮肤疾病药物递送系统。NJU-China’s project introduction:Alopecia is a skin disease disturbing a wide population， impacting their appearance， and raising anxiety. NJU-China team targets androgen alopecia(AP)， which shows the highest prevalence. Our team does comprehensive research on its pathogenic mechanism and selects several genetic targets. On the one hand， we apply the RNAi technique and mRNA embedding elements to regulate gene expression particularly. On the other hand， we use exosomes and microneedles to carry and deliver drug molecules(siRNA and mRNA) to follicle cells transdermally. Meanwhile， through the research on treating AP， our project is intended to develop a drug delivery system using exosomes and microneedles to treat other skin diseases.

Name: 南京工业大学
Title: Engineering Clostridium butyricum - the conversion from anaerobe  to aerobe酪丁酸梭菌—从厌氧菌到好氧菌的转换
Abstract: 酪丁酸梭菌是一种专性厌氧菌，我们的项目目标是使其经过工程改造后能够在有氧条件下生长。我们将在酪丁酸梭菌中引入丙酮酸脱氢酶，以使其在有氧条件下仍能够实现从丙酮酸到乙酰辅酶A的转化。同时，我们考虑引入相关氧耐受性基因来减小工程菌受到的氧气毒害作用。此外，我们计划在我们的工程菌中建立一个生物传感器系统，以期对整个过程有更多的监管调控。Clostridium butyricum， a kind of strictly anaerobic， is used in our project. The goal of our project is to make C. butyricum grow under aerobic conditions after engineering transformation.Our bacteria will be introduced with pyruvate dehydrogenase， so it could still achieve the conversion from pyruvate to acetyl coenzyme A in the case of PFOR(Pyruvate-Ferredoxin Oxidoreductase) being poisoned by oxygen or ROS(Reactive Oxygen Species)under aerobic conditions.At the same time， we are considering to introduce some oxygen-tolerance genes to reduce the oxygen toxicity of our engineered bacteria.In addition， we plan to establish a biosensor system in our engineering bacteria in order to have more control over the whole process.

Name: 南京农业大学生命科学学院
Title: Liver monitor: Rapid cell-free detection of liver disease based on bile acids level; 肝脏卫士: 依据胆汁酸盐水平的肝脏疾病快速检测
Abstract: 当前肝脏疾病盛行于世界，每年约有200万人死于肝病，其中很多患者因未能及时发现肝脏患病导致进一步加重甚至死亡。胆汁酸是检测肝脏相关疾病的一个极为重要的指标，肝硬化、胆道闭锁等等疾病使肝脏发生损伤都会使尿液胆汁酸含量发生成倍增加。NAU_CHINA团队着眼于种种现象，通过建立一种无细胞的系统定量检测尿液胆汁酸含量，实现在脱离细胞的条件下对肝脏相关疾病的家庭化高效检测。At present， liver disease is prevalent in the world. About 2 million people die of it every year， and many of them suffer from further aggravation or even death due to untimely detect liver disease. Bile acid is a very important index to detect liver related diseases， liver cirrhosis， biliary atresia and other diseases caused by liver damage will make urine bile acid content doubled. The NAU-CHINA team focuses on a variety of phenomena. We try to use cell-free system to quantitatively detect urine bile acid content to achieve efficient and home-based detection of liver-related diseases.

Name: 南京师范大学食品与制药工程学院
Title: Omega-3鸡蛋-开启补脑强体之旅（Omega 3 eggs - Start your brain booster journey）
Abstract: 鸡蛋作为营养摄入最广泛的来源之一，富含蛋白质、脂肪、维生素等，其中脂肪以不饱和脂肪酸居多。DHA和EPA是人体所必需的omega-3系多不饱和脂肪酸，对人体健康有着不可替代的作用。市场上DHA鸡蛋主要有两种生产方式，一种是在蛋鸡饲料中加入亚麻籽，经过鸡的体内代谢途径生成DHA；另一种是直接用天然藻源喂养蛋鸡。但是这两种方式存在成本高、工艺复杂、环境依赖性强等缺点。因此我们希望通过合成生物学的手段构建工程菌株，使其能联产DHA和EPA，再将其加入到蛋鸡饲料中，以期获得富含DHA和EPA的Omega-3鸡蛋。此外，可按需改变鸡蛋中DHA/EPA的比例，以适应各类人群的需求，做到低成本投入和高效产出。本项目致力于推动食品健康领域的发展，推动合成生物学大众化。As one of the most extensive sources of nutrition， eggs are rich in protein， fat and vitamins， among which unsaturated fatty acids are in the majority. DHA and EPA are essential omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids， which play an irreplaceable role in human health. There are two main production methods of DHA eggs in the market. One is to add flaxseed into the feed of laying hens and generate DHA through the metabolic pathway of chickens. The other is to feed layers directly from a natural algae source. However， these two methods have disadvantages such as high cost， complex process and strong environment dependence. Therefore， we hope to construct an engineered strain that can produce DHA and EPA by means of synthetic biology， and then add it into the feed of laying hens to obtain omega-3 eggs rich in DHA and EPA. In addition， the proportion of DHA/EPA in eggs can be changed as needed to meet the needs of all kinds of people， so as to achieve low cost input and high efficiency output. The project is dedicated to advancing the field of food health and popularizing synthetic biology.

Name: 清华大学
Title: 综合测量精液活力和致育能力的工程菌改造（Run Sperm Run）
Abstract: 生殖健康一直是可持续发展目标中的重要组成部分。今年来，生育率逐年下降，许多育龄夫妇受到不孕不育症的影响。而其中，男性的精液质量下降是主要因素。目前，精子质量主要通过医院挂号诊断，但仍高度依赖于人工镜检，耗时长且效率低。Tsinghua iGEM2022团队尝试利用合成生物学对精子质量进行检测。基于微流控芯片的产品旨在同时测量精子的运动速度和生育能力两个指标。芯片中内置的工程菌拥有改造后的两套双组份系统Pmr系统和Nisin系统，分别识别精子表面的sp10和EGFR蛋白，作为精子浓度和生育能力的指标，进行检测和报告。接着，在双组份系统下游引入基于lambda 阻遏系统的逻辑门，通过条件计算将指示两个指标的信号分开，最终以荧光蛋白进行报告。我们的精子质量测试项目旨在提供一种可行的方法，让男性可以在家庭中进行自测，以方便准确地获得精子质量状态的初步结果，为进一步的就医提供指导。With increasing infertility rate among the population， reproductive health has become a hotspot of concern， among which low sperm quality is considered to be the major cause. Currently， sperm quality can be examined mainly through hospital appointments which are time-consuming and inconvenient， adding additional challenge to tackling the issue of reproductive health. Therefore， our team has proposed a novel diagnostic method to test sperm quality for household use. The chip-based product is designed to measure sperm motility and fertility simultaneously. Engineered bacteria are organized through intricate design of a two-component system to recognize Sp10 and EGFR protein on the surface of sperm， which are critical index of sperm concentration and fertility respectively. The recognization through the two-component system would then trigger downstream signaling transduction to induce the expression of reporter genes for the two indexes respectively. A logic gated system based on cro/cI in lambda repressor is introduced to separate the two signals indicating concentration and fertility via conditional computation. The chip is designed to exhibit sperm quality information in a visualized signal of color representation.In summary， our project of rapid sperm quality test can provide a feasible way of self-examining the sperm motility and fertility at home with accuracy and convenience， contributing our efforts to takcling the issue of reproductive health.

Name: 厦门大学
Title: 合成生物学方法检测和防治对虾急性肝胰腺坏死综合症、Operable Magic to Efficiently Getting over AHPND
Abstract: Shrimp is a kind of economic marine product that receives attention all over the world， including Litopenaeus setiferus， Penaeus monodon， and Penaeus japonicus. They are delicious popular seafood， which are also particularly rich in protein， calcium， and astaxanthin. However， many diseases caused by bacterial pathogens will trigger not only the death of shrimp but also the huge economic loss of fisherfolks. Among these diseases， acute hepatopancreatic necrosis disease (AHPND) is a really nasty contagion that would cause rapid death on a large scale in shrimp aquaculture. The AHPND is mainly infected by  Vibrio parahaemolyticus that carry the virulence gene of pirA and pirB. Using drugs and antibiotics is the common approach to deal with this Vibrio currently. However， abuse of antibiotics and drugs neither specifically targets this Vibrio nor prevents the shrimp from death quickly. It would also destroy the ecological microenvironment and increase the risk of antibiotic resistance. Thus， early diagnosis and effective prevention are the correct measures that should be carried out for the infection of Vibrio parahaemolyticus. Therefore， we try to develop a comprehensive means that combines diagnosis， treatment， and prevention strategies to deal with the AHPND based on synthetic biology. 对虾是一种备受世界关注的海产品，南美白对虾、斑节对虾、日本对虾等不同种类的对虾都在世界范围内被广泛养殖。对虾不仅是餐桌上的美味，还富含蛋白质、钙和虾青素等营养物质。然而，对虾疾病制约了对虾养殖业的发展。对虾急性肝胰腺坏死综合症（AHPND）会导致对虾的大量死亡和减产，是近年来影响对虾养殖最为严重的疾病之一，给对虾养殖业造成巨大的经济损失。已有研究结果表明，AHPND主要由携带pirA和pirB毒力基因的副溶血性弧菌（Vibrio parahaemolyticus）感染引起。目前，施用抗生素是对虾养殖过程中防治副溶血性弧菌的重要方法。然而，抗生素既不能特异性地针对这种弧菌进行防治，也无法防止对虾感染后的快速死亡，滥用抗生素还会破坏生态微环境、提高细菌产生耐药性的风险。因此，XMU-China 团队提出了OMEGA——一种基于合成生物学的针对AHPND的诊断、治疗和预防的综合方法，以保证对虾养殖绿色健康可持续发展。

Name: 上海交通大学生命科学技术学院
Title: DL-ecGEM of Actinomycetes 放线菌的DL-ecGEM模型重构
Abstract: 基于约束的全基因组代谢模型（GEM）常用于识别生物基因操纵靶点、鉴别功能基因，为放线菌重构GEM有助于发现新型抗生素、优化抗生素生产。本项目拟开发出一种建模软件，为放线菌重构ecGEM提供可行方案，同时结合深度学习预测代谢酶的转化系数Kcat以弥补参数缺失，加入蛋白三维结构约束和蛋白酶突变热点识别工具给出改造靶点推荐，并利用软件建模验证改造方案对细胞表型产生的影响，为酶工程实验提供定向改造方向、缩短实验周期。Constraint-based genome-scale metabolic models (GEM) are often used to identify gene manipulation targets and functional genes. Reconstructing GEMs for actinomycetes helps to discover new antibiotics and optimize antibiotic production. The project aims to develop a modeling software to provide a feasible scheme for the reconstruction of ecGEM by actinomycetes. At the same time， it combines deep learning to predict the conversion coefficient of metabolic enzymes Kcat to compensate for the lack of parameters. Protein three-dimensional structure constraints and proteolytic mutation hotspots identification tools were added to recommend the target of modification. It uses the effects of modification on cell phenotypes which were verified by software modeling validating retrofitting scheme to provide the orientation of modification for enzyme engineering experiments and shorten the experimental period.

Name: 上海交通大学生命科学技术学院Bio-X研究院
Title: Interstellar Information Transportation With DNA Storage Technology And Bacterial Spores利用DNA储存技术和细菌孢子进行星际信息传输
Abstract: Our project this year is all about interstellar information transportation with DNA storage technology and bacterial spores. Information with regard to all the aspects of human civilization is what really counts but easy to be ignored when we think about developing new techniques enabling mankind to travel in space or even migrate to another planet. Therefore， how a huge amount of information can be stored with a little space and an affordable cost， and how the information is stored in security and stability amid harsh cosmic environment to support the accurate transport are the challenges we have confronted.我们的项目今年的主题是利用DNA存储进行星际信息传输技术和细菌孢子。关于人类文明各个方面的信息是非常重要的，但当我们考虑开发新技术，使人类能够在太空中旅行甚至迁移到另一个星球时，这些信息却很容易被忽视。因此，如何以很小的空间和负担得起的成本存储大量信息，以及如何在恶劣的宇宙环境中安全稳定地存储信息以支持精确传输，是我们面临的挑战。

Name: 上海科技大学生命科学与技术学院
Title: 用于火星基地的微型生物生产循环系统（MBCS-Mars）
Abstract: 未来，由于地球上空间和资源的限制，人类可能会走向太空，移民到某个遥远的异星上。移民初期，需要有限的条件下利用星球上的资源进行生产来满足人类的食品药品需求。火星，与地球同属太阳系的宜居带，拥有大气层和丰富的地表资源，移民火星很可能会成为人类异星移民的第一站。因此我们以火星为场景，设计了三元微生物共生为基础的微型生物生产循环系统（Mini Bioproduction Circle System， MBCS），来满足人类在火星移民中的食品药品生产需要。In the future， because of the growing human population and the limited number of resources on Earth， it is possible that humans will decide to go into space in search of another planet to live on. In the beginning， it is necessary to make use of the limited resources available on the alien planet to produce food and medicine.Like Earth， Mars is in the habitable zone of the solar system and has an atmosphere. It also has abundant resources on its surface， making it very likely that Mars will be the first step for human colonization. With this in mind， we designed the Mini Bioproduction Circle System (MBCS) based on ternary microbial symbiosis with the resources available on Mars to meet the food and drug production needs of human beings.

Name: 深圳大学生命与海洋科学学院
Title: 中文：水稻纹枯病的检测与治疗；英文：The detection and treatment of rice sheath blight
Abstract: 水稻是我们国家主要粮食作物，然而，水稻三大主要病害之一——水稻纹枯病的有效解决手段却一直处于空缺状态。该疾病的病原菌为立枯丝核菌，易于传播、难以根治。因此，我们设计针对水稻纹枯病的综合防治方案，旨在进行水稻纹枯病的田间检测与治疗，并有望拓展应用于其他常见作物疾病。在我们的综合性方案中，首先，我们使用电子鼻系统和LAMP-OTG/LAMP-LFD进行水稻纹枯病早期检测。然后，我们使用疏水材料包裹过表达表面疏水蛋白epl1与蛋白酶prb1、表达抗菌肽sn1深绿木霉工程菌，使其自发聚集在水稻的水生界面处，实现对立枯丝核菌的传播阻断与初步抑制。最后，我们利用RNAi手段，干扰立枯丝核菌侵染过程中PG、PMK1等关键蛋白的表达，实现立枯丝核菌的彻底灭杀。Rice is one of the main food crops in China. However， the effective solution of rice sheath blight， one of the three main diseases of rice， has been lacking. The pathogen of the disease is Rhizoctonia solani， which is easy to spread and difficult to control. Therefore， we designed a comprehensive control blueprint for rice sheath blight， aiming at field detection and treatment of rice sheath blight， and it is expected to expand its application to other common crop diseases.Firstly， we established an E-nose system and a LAMP-OTG/LAMP-LFD system for early detection of rice sheath blight. Then， we selected proper hydrophobic materials to wrap engineered fungi - Trichoderma atroviride - with overexpression of surface hydrophobic protein EPL1 and protease PRB1 as well as expression of antimicrobial peptide SN1， which are supposed to spontaneously aggregate at the aquatic interface of rice to achieve transmission blocking and preliminary inhibition of R. solani. Ultimately， we took advantage of RNAi to interfere with the expression of PG， PMK1 and other key proteins in the infection of R. solani， so as to achieve the elimination of R. solani.

Name: 深圳职业技术学院
Title: 自生长多功能膜  Self-growth Multifunction Film
Abstract: 随着人民生活水平的提高，人们对护肤越来越关注。通过调查，我们发现人们主要关注的护肤功效是补水保湿、抗衰老、提亮、修护、淡斑。GSH这类活性抗氧化物具有这些热门护肤功效，却受限于其稳定性差，溶于水后易分解，从而难以有效应用于化妆品中。为此我们设计一个新的GSH应用思路：通过活菌产品的形式，即产即用。此时需要一个合适的载体，具有补水保湿和强亲肤性的细菌纤维素是不错的选择。为此我们选用具最强合成细菌纤维素能力的木醋杆菌作为底盘，通过合成生物学和光遗传学的方法改造木醋杆菌。设计分为三个模块，一是药物生产，选用新型双功能酶生产GSH；二是红光产膜，用红光控制细菌生产BC；三是安全与释放模块，用蓝光控制细菌裂解，让胞内的GSH释放。With the improvement of people's living standards， people pay more and more attention to skin care. Through the survey， we found that the skin care efficacies that people are mainly concerned about are moisturizing， anti-aging， brightening， repairing， and lightening. Active antioxidants such as GSH have these popular skin care efficacies， but are limited by their poor stability and easy to decompose after dissolving in water， making it difficult to be effectively used in cosmetics. Therefore， we designed a new GSH application idea: in the form of live bacteria products， use immediately what are produced. At this time， a suitable carrier is needed， and BC with moisturizing and skin-friendly properties is a good choice. We selected Gluconacetobacter hensenii， which has the strongest ability to synthesize BC， as the chassis cell， and transformed Gluconacetobacter hensenii through synthetic biology and optogenetics. Our design is divided into three modules， the first is the drug production module， which uses a new bifunctional enzyme to produce GSH. The second is BC production module， which produce BC under the control of red light. The third is the safety and release module. Under the control of blue light， bacteria are lysed to release intracellular GSH.

Name: 深圳中学
Title: β-半乳糖苷酶工程改造  β-Galactosidase Engineering
Abstract: 我们的项目主要通过在乳制品中添加β-半乳糖苷酶来降低乳糖不耐受患者日常生活中乳糖不耐受症的发生频率。因为乳糖酶成本较高，很少有乳制品会特意加入乳糖酶。因为米曲霉胞外表达的β-半乳糖苷酶在酸性环境中活性更强，所以在大部分奶制品生产的中性环境中米曲霉胞外表达的β-半乳糖苷酶难以得到最佳运用。我们的项目通过定向改造beta半乳糖苷酶的最适pH，并将优化后的beta半乳糖苷酶添加到乳制品，可以在工业生产中降低使用乳糖酶的成本，从而向乳糖不耐受人群提供乳制品。米曲霉胞外表达的β-半乳糖苷酶可以更快的分解乳糖，从而缓解乳糖不耐症的症状。 总体而言，乳糖不耐受患者也可以很好的食用乳制品。Our project primarily serves to reduce the frequency of occurrence of lactose intolerance in people's daily life by adding beta-galactosidase into the packaging of dairy products. Additionally， few dairy products are specially designed for people with lactose intolerance because of the unaffordable cost and some limitations of enzymes. The nearly neutral environment of producing fairy products limits the application of beta-galactosidase extracellularly expressed by A. oryzae， which prefers the acidic environment. With the innovation of adding lactase into the packaging of dairy products and engineering the optimum pH of the lactase， lactose can be broken down faster during transportation as well as sale， and thus， symptoms of lactose intolerance will be relieved. Overall， people suffering from lactose intolerance can also live with dairy products peacefully.

Name: 沈阳药科大学
Title: TNBCanceraser 三阴乳腺癌消除器
Abstract: There is a well-known fact that breast cancer has overtaken lung cancer as the most frequently diagnosed cancer according to the Health China. Although almost Breast cancer have over expressing of estrogen receptor ， progesterone receptor and human epidermal growth factor receptor 2， yet other type of BC called TNBC lacks all of them . Therefore， target therapy become low response rate. Now ， the effective approach for targeting HER2 such as Trastuzumab for breast cancer still play a little role in TNBC for terrible targeting . Meanwhile ， it always associates with toxicity and resistance. Therefore， new therapy strategies to TNBC are urgently needed. Recently， Lgals2 has been proved to be a potential target for TNBC. Therefore， we decided to modify the probiotic E.colo Nissle 1917. Tsr is a typical chemoreceptor in it ， we knock its gene and use plasmid to express Tlpc which exist in H pylori. It receive stimulates and swim to the high lactic region which is characterized by cancer cell’s microenvironment. Then ， we decide to use ScFv to bind Lgals2 .After binding it ，  it will induce the expression of PEA which can kill cancer cells. As for other part ， the oscillator system and safety part are under the construction .众所周知，根据《健康中国》的报告，乳腺癌已超过肺癌成为最常见的癌症。虽然几乎乳腺癌有雌激素受体、孕激素受体和人类表皮生长因子受体 2 的过度表达，但其他类型的称为 TNBC 的 BC 缺乏所有这些。因此，靶向治疗的反应率变得很低。现在，靶向HER2的有效方法，如乳腺癌的曲妥珠单抗，在TNBC中对于可怕的靶向作用仍然很小。同时，它总是与毒性和耐药性联系在一起。因此，迫切需要新的 TNBC 治疗策略。最近，Lgals2 已被证明是 TNBC 的潜在目标。因此，我们决定对益生菌E.colo Nissle 1917进行改造。Tsr是其中典型的化学感受器，我们敲除它的基因并用质粒表达存在于幽门螺杆菌中的Tlpc。它接受刺激并游到以癌细胞微环境为特征的高乳酸区。然后，我们决定用 ScFv 结合 Lgals2。结合后，它会诱导 PEA 的表达，从而杀死癌细胞。至于其他部分，振荡系统和安全部分正在建设中。

Name: 思铺学院
Title: 我们的项目旨在研究如何改造精氨酸工程益生菌来实现结直肠癌的免疫治疗。免疫疗法是近几年新兴的癌症治疗方法，主要通过药物强化人体免疫系统，依靠人体免疫力将癌细胞消灭。而精氨酸就是一种可以调节人体免疫应答反应的物质。因此我们的项目，想要借助基因工程的方法，改造对人体无害的益生菌ECN1917，生产一种可以在人体肠道产生精氨酸，实现结直肠癌免疫治疗的益生菌药物。
Abstract: Our project aims to investigate how arginine engineered probiotics can be engineered to enable immunotherapy for colorectal cancer. Immunotherapy is an emerging cancer treatment method in recent years， mainly through drugs to strengthen the human immune system， relying on human immunity to eliminate cancer cells. Arginine is a substance that can regulate the body's immune response. Therefore， our project wants to use genetic engineering methods to modify the probiotic ECN1917， which is harmless to the human body， and produce a probiotic drug that can produce arginine in the human intestine and realize the immunotherapy of colorectal cancer.

Name: 思铺学院
Title: Early diagnosis of breast cancer utilizing cell free crispr cas12a system to detect circRNA biomarkers 运用无细胞crispr cas12a系统检测靶标circRNA完成对乳腺癌的早筛
Abstract: We want to develop a model that can be applied to various cancer early detections apart with breast cancer. Also， we want to take this chance to enhance the global awareness of breast cancer.我们利用新发现的乳腺癌生物标志物circRNA 1982和1785来实现乳腺癌的早期检测。我们使用的技术称为crispr cas12a系统，cas12a酶通过互补整合与目标环状rna结合后，可以非特异性切割单链dna荧光分子。我们希望开发一种模型，除了乳腺癌，还可以应用于各种癌症的早期检测。同时，我们也希望借此机会提高全球对乳腺癌的认识。

Name: 四川大学
Title: （暂定）基于赤藓糖醇独立生态位的益生菌长效定植  Gut Nichery: Long-term colonization of probiotics based on erythritol exclusive metabolic niche
Abstract: 我们今年希望设计一个基于代糖赤藓糖醇的工程益生菌平台，以解决其定制不稳定及密度不足的问题。我们计划以益生菌大肠杆菌Nissle 1917（EcN）为底盘生物，通过将可以分解赤藓糖醇的稀有基因座引入其中，使其可以利用赤藓糖醇作为碳源，以增加其在肠道菌群中的竞争优势，从而增加其定植效果和种群密度。同时，我们还引入了赤藓糖醇诱导系统，以期在EcN中实现赤藓糖醇诱导表达系统的表征和构建。我们理想的结果是——人们只需要服用代糖赤藓糖醇就可以实现在肠道中外源基因的诱导表达，实现对菌群的精确调控。In this year， we want to design an engineered chassis organism based on the sugar substitute erythritol， in order to address its custom instability and lack of density. We plan to use the probiotic E. coli Nissle 1917 (EcN) as the chassis organism and increase its colonisation and population density by introducing a rare locus that can break down erythritol so that it can use erythritol as a carbon source to increase its competitive advantage in the intestinal flora. We have also introduced an erythritol induction system with a view to characterising and constructing an erythritol-inducible expression system in EcN. Our ideal outcome is that one can achieve induced expression of exogenous genes in the gut for precise regulation of the flora by simply taking the sugar substitute erythritol.

Name: 天津大学化工学院
Title: Micro Nuwa-A multi-target editor for DNA information storage
Abstract: iGEM Tianjin2022的项目是基于DNA存储技术的更多可能性应用。团队构建了单碱基编辑器，gRNA阵列以实现碱基多靶点的编辑技术，实现了对DNA序列上多个位点的同时修改。通过编程手段将一段要储存的文本，音乐等信息转化为可以利用单碱基编辑器多靶点编辑的序列。通过合适的编码将编辑工具的潜能发挥到最大。队伍选择了音乐与图像两种信息证明系统的可行性。IGEM tianjin2022's project is based on more possible applications of DNA storage technology. The team built a single base editor and gRNA array to realize the editing technology of base multi-target， and realize the simultaneous modification of multiple sites on the DNA sequence. Through programming， a piece of text， music and other information to be stored can be transformed into a sequence that can be edited by a single base editor with multiple targets. Maximize the potential of editing tools through appropriate coding. The team chose music and image to prove the feasibility of the system.

Name: 同济大学生命科学与技术学院
Title: Tongji_Software 同济_软件
Abstract: 基因编辑技术在合成生物学研究中是不可或缺的一种工具，但目前也存在脱靶效应、非特异性结合等问题。目前研究发现anti-CRISPR蛋白可抑制脱靶效应，提高安全性，此外，它还能作为基因编辑调控的抑制剂，提供更多可选择的工具来进行实验设计。因此，我们关注到这种蛋白，希望能通过寻找这些有助于基因编辑的蛋白来辅助合成生物学实验。我们的软件设计目的是提供一个可以搜索不断扩大的病毒基因组、宏基因组等数据库的全新Acr蛋白的工具，从而扩展Acrs的多样性，为合成生物学潜在基因编辑工具的挖掘提供一种简单便捷的方式。Gene editing technology is an indispensable tool in synthetic biology research， but there are some problems such as off-target effect and non-specific binding. Current studies have shown that anti-CRISPR can inhibit off-target effects and improve safety. In addition， anti-CRISPR can be used as an inhibitor of gene editing regulation， providing more alternative tools for experimental design. So we're paying close attention to the protein， and we're mining these proteins to help with our synthetic biology experiments. Our software is designed to provide a tool that can search for novel Acr proteins in the ever-expanding database of viral genomes， metagenomes， and so on， thus expanding the diversity of Acrs and providing a simple and convenient way to mine potential gene editing tools in synthetic biology.

Name: 武汉大学生命科学学院
Title: Reach for Light
Abstract: 抑郁症，也称重性抑郁障碍或临床抑郁症，是一种常见的精神障碍。抑郁症患者也可能在没有明显生理原因的情况下表现出各种生理疾病。抑郁症可能是长期或反复发作的，严重损害了人们在工作或日常生活的能力。在最严重的情况下，抑郁症会导致自杀。我们希望基于肠道益生菌长双歧杆菌Bifidobacterium longum， 基于其本身具有的抗抑郁效果，赋予其长期给药的能力。它将接受振荡器的调节，长期、定期、周期性地产生天然抗抑郁药物SAMe以治疗抑郁症。通过口服，工程菌将定植在抑郁症患者肠道内，在作用过程中，通过温控安全开关防止其泄漏，也可以通过服用AHL来主动终止给药。Depression， also known as major depressive disorder， is a common but serious mood disorder. Patients suffering from depression require uptake of different kinds of antidepressants， which may cause disgusting side effects and economic and/or mental burden. To address this problem， our team tend to engineer the probiotic Bifidobacterium longum， to periodically generate SAMe， which is a natural metabolite and a natural antidepressant.

Name: 西安交通大学
Title: Synthesis of herbicides and extracellular polysaccharide（EPS）using blue light induction switch element 利用蓝光诱导开关合成除草剂和EPS（最终版本还未确定）
Abstract: 我们尝试设计工程菌解决滥用除草剂和地膜导致的塑料污染的问题，本项目的特色之处在于蓝光诱导开关和温控自杀元件双调控，借助阿拉伯糖诱导开关改造为蓝光诱导开关，实现化学物质调控转为低成本物理调控，从而可控合成除草剂和胞外多糖，达到特定温度后开启自杀模式释放它们，发挥除草剂的作用并且胞外多糖交联产生保水保温的生物地膜。   We try to design engineering bacteria as a solution to the problems caused by the abuse of herbicides and mulch plastic pollution， the characteristic of our research group is that dual regulationthe between blue light induction switch element and temperature control suicide part， achieving low cost and controllable synthesis of herbicides and extracellular polysaccharide. When it reach a certain temperature， engineering bacterium are in a suicide mode， releasing the synthesized herbicide and the EPS which crosslinks acting as a water-preserving biofilm.

Name: 西北大学生命科学学院
Title: 红蓝之战/The Battle between Red and Blue
Abstract: NWU-CHINA-A今年的项目致力于利用工程益生菌作为底盘制作一种适用于检测肠道微量出血的生物传感器并且设计一款可在非实验条件下简易培养细菌的装置实现方便自测。通过在大肠杆菌中引入双质粒，将ChuA（血红素转运蛋白）、HrtR（乳球菌血红素反应性转录抑制因子）、启动子HrtO、色素基因引入工程益生菌中。通过服用益生菌作用于肠道，当肠道微量出血时，ChuA会将肠道内的血红素转运到大肠杆菌中与HrtR结合影响HrtO启动子的转录表达，启动子下游的色素基因便会转录表达。最后在排出的粪便中检测色素，从有无颜色判断是否存在微量出血。Our project is committed to using engineering probiotics as a chassis to make a biosensor suitable for detecting intestinal micro bleeding， and to design a device that can easily cultivate bacteria under non experimental conditions to achieve convenient self-test. By introducing double plasmids into E. coli， Chua (heme transporter)， hrtr (Lactococcus heme reactive transcription inhibitor)， promoter HrtO and pigment genes were introduced into engineering probiotics. By taking probiotics to act on the intestines， when there is a small amount of intestinal bleeding， Chua will transport the heme in the intestines to E. coli and combine with hrtr to affect the transcription and expression of the hrto promoter， and the pigment gene downstream of the promoter will be transcribed and expressed. Finally， detect the pigment in the excreted feces， and judge whether there is trace bleeding from the presence or absence of color.

Name: 西北工业大学生命学院
Title: Construction of Dual Enzyme Degradation System for Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons
Abstract: 项目简介：多环芳烃（PAHs）是指含两个或两个以上苯环的芳烃，是一种普遍分布在自然环境中具有持久性、高毒性的有机污染物。目前，环境中微生物修复是去除PAHs的主要途径之一。漆酶和木质素过氧化物酶是天然的可降解多环芳烃的酶， 二者存在协同作用。因此，优化及共表达漆酶和木质素过氧化物酶对降解PAHs有重要意义。我们正以大肠杆菌和蓝藻为底盘菌，利用DNA重组技术异源表达漆酶和木质素过氧化物酶，分析不同微生物体系降解PAHs的效率，从而构建高效的人工菌降解多环芳烃体系。Abstract：Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) refer to aromatic hydrocarbons containing two or more benzene rings， which are persistent and highly toxic organic pollutants widely distributed in nature. At present， microbial degradation in the environment is one of the main ways to remove PAHs. Laccase and lignin peroxidase are natural enzymes that can degrade polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons， and there is a synergistic effect between them. Therefore， optimization of co-expression system of laccase and lignin peroxidase are of great significance for the degradation of PAHs.We intends to use E.coli and cyanobacteria as chassis bacterias， and to use DNA recombination technology to heterologously express laccase and lignin peroxidase and analyze the efficiency of PAHs degradation by different microbial systems， so as to construct an efficient artificial bacteria PAHs degradation system.

Name: 西交利物浦大学生物科学系
Title: 新型生物膜用于工业污水处理 Application of new biofilm in industrial wastewater treatment
Abstract: 在工业污水处理环节中，我们利用生物膜，对污水中的重金属离子吸附回收。我们设计了净水滤芯，借助合成生物学手段改造的工程菌，充分发挥其吸附重金属离子的优势。旨在工业废水处理环节中，一步完成多种重金属离子的阻拦、吸附回收和排放检测环节。希望利用该项目的研究成果为实现工业零排放的目标贡献力量。We designed a water purification filter to take full advantage of engineered bacteria ability to absorb heavy metals. It aims to complete the blocking， adsorption recovery and emission detection of a variety of heavy metal ions in the process of industrial wastewater treatment. We hope to use the research results of this project to contribute to the goal of zero emissions in the industry.

Name: 浙江大学
Title: Story Light 利用微生物矿化（MICP）修复石料文物
Abstract: 项目简介：由于经年累月的风化作用，不少石料文物都遭到了不同程度的破坏，其中文物的微小裂缝更是以其难检测。难治理与高危性成为石料文物修复的一大难题。因此，ZJU-China着眼于石料文物微小裂缝的修复，基于工程枯草芽胞杆菌诱导的生物矿化，在细胞外形成碳酸钙沉淀，填补石料文物的微小裂缝，同时制造胞外碳酸钙支架，使碳酸钙形成坚固的结构，加上群体感应和生物安全模块，致力于开发石料文物综合保护的技术。Due to years of weathering， many stone cultural relics have been damaged to varying degrees， and the tiny cracks of cultural relics are especially difficult to detect， forming a major problem of stone cultural relics restoration. Therefore， this year， ZJU-China focuses on the repair of tiny cracks in stone cultural relics. Based on the bio-mineralization induced by bacillus subtilis， calcium carbonate precipitates are formed in vitro to fill the tiny cracks in stone cultural relics. At the same time， the extracellular calcium carbonate scaffold is designed to make the synthesized calcium carbonate form a firm structure. Lastly， quorum sensing and bio-safety parts are added to develop a comprehensive protection technology.

Name: 浙江大学杭州国际科创中心
Title: 茶卫士 Teafender
Abstract: 我们是HiZJU-China团队，我们今年的参赛主题是“利用性信息素进行茶蚜防治”，项目名为“Teafender”（取自Tea和defender）。茶蚜为同翅目蚜科声蚜属的一种昆虫，分布安徽、江苏、广东等省份，除危害茶树、油茶外，还为害柑桔类、荔枝、香蕉等。其成虫和若虫刺吸嫩叶汁液，使叶片多皱缩卷曲。在项目中，我们将来自棉铃虫的G蛋白偶联受体HarmOR10的对应基因导入酿酒酵母，利用工程菌检测茶树受茶蚜虫害之后释放的苯甲醛，并释放茶蚜的性信息素（荆芥内酯和荆芥醇），并且我们希望释放的荆芥内酯和荆芥醇成一定比例，尽可能接近于茶蚜性信息素的成分比例，以高效地干扰茶蚜的交配，同时吸引茶蚜的天敌，最终达到减少茶园中的茶蚜虫害的目的。除去主体部分外，项目还包括茶园的实地考察，消费者和茶农的问卷调查以及有关合成生物学的科普活动，当我们完成实验室工作之后，我们还将进行田间试验，将我们的项目正式落地并进行推广应用。 We are Team HiZJU-China. Our theme this year is the prevention and cure of Toxoptera aurantii by using its sex pheromone and the project is called Teafender from two nouns tea and defender. Toxoptera aurantii， also known as tea aphid， is a kind of insect of Homoptera， which is widely distributed in Anhui， Jiangsu， Guangdong province and so on. In addition to harming tea trees and oil tea，it also do damage to citrus， litchi， bananas， etc. In our project， we will introduce the gene of the G protein-coupled receptor HarmOR10 from Helicoverpa armigera into yeast. Then we will use our engineered bacteria to detect benzaldehyde secreted by tea trees after Toxoptera aurantii infestation and release the sex pheromones of Toxoptera aurantii whose composition including nepetalactone and nepetalactol. We also hope that the nepetalactone and nepetalactol are in a ratio which is as close as possible to the ratio of the components of the tea aphid sex pheromone. This project is aimed at Interfering with the mating of Toxoptera aurantii and attracting natural enemies of Toxoptera aurantii， which will ultimately reduce the infestation of Toxoptera aurantii in tea plantations. Except the main parts，the project also includes field trips to tea plantations， questionnaire surveys of consumers and tea farmers， and science popularization activities about synthetic biology， etc. Once we have completed our laboratory work， we will also conduct field trials to formalize our project in the field and promote its application.

Name: 浙江工业大学
Title: Oral Probiotics
Abstract: 口腔问题是一个影响大，范围广的健康问题，本课题基于枯草芽孢杆菌开发口腔益生菌，寻求一种低成本、便捷的预防口腔疾病的方式。我们设计了多条基因线路实现检测口腔卫生情况与预防龋齿的目的，同时实现检测结果便捷的反馈。最终将科研成果、计算机的建模和大量实验数据相结合，研发可靠便捷的口腔益生菌。Oral problem is a high-impact and wide-ranging health problem.In this project， we developed oral probiotics based on Bacillus subtilis to seek for a low-cost and convenient way to prevent oral diseases. We designed multiple genetic circuit to achieve the purpose of detecting oral hygiene and preventing dental caries， as well as achieving convenient feedback of test results. The end result was a combination of scientific research， computer modeling and extensive experimental data to develop a reliable and convenient oral probiotic.

Name: 中国地质大学（武汉）环境学院
Title: 一种基于转录的具有广泛适用性的环二鸟苷酸生物传感器   A Broadly Applicable Transcription-Based Reporter for Gauging c-di-GMP Levels
Abstract: 生物膜作为主要的微生物生长模式广泛存在于自然、工程及医疗环境中，使其受到越来越多的关注。生物膜形成过程中，第二信使分子环二鸟苷酸（c-di-GMP）作为中心调节因子扮演着重要角色。已证实c-di-GMP浓度影响生物膜形成，但在多数细菌中很难实时监测c-di-GMP水平。这极大地限制了生物膜生物学和生物膜工程学研究的发展。本研究将开发一种可潜在地广泛利用于不同微生物的c-di-GMP生物传感器。该工具灵敏且可实时监测c-di-GMP动态变化，亦可实现高通量筛选。Since biofilm presents the prevalent mode of microbial growth in natural， engineered and medical settings， the investigation of biofilm has become an attractive field of research. The second messenger c-di-GMP plays an essential role as a central regulator in biofilm formation. While numerous studies have examined the effects of c-di-GMP levels on biofilm formation， it has not been possible to monitor c-di-GMP levels in real time in many bacteria， which limits the development of research on biofilm biology and biofilm engineering. To overcome this limitation， we will construct a c-di-GMP biosensor that is readily adaptable for gauging c-di-GMP levels in different bacteria， and try to achieve cell-free system. This tool is sensitive， can supply real-time monitoring of c-di-GMP dynamics， and are amenable to high throughput screening.

Name: 中国海洋大学海洋生命学院
Title: 自动调节生产生长连续筛选生产平台
Abstract: 敲除工程菌生长必须基因并导入到质粒中去，在其前加上一个弱表达启动子，使得工程菌体内质粒拷贝数减少，工程菌死亡的目的。借用拟南芥中的一种通路，当发酵罐中的工程菌数量达到一定阈值，特定的启动子开始表达。并且通过靶向膜的一种适配体特异性地将产物运出胞外，弱工程菌发生退化则适配体相连接的核糖开关将表达自杀蛋白。

Name: 中国科学技术大学
Title: 冰片醇的高效生物合成（Efficient biosynthesis of borneol） 和 磁小体介导的癌症靶向治疗（Targeted therapy of cancer mediated by magnetosomes）
Abstract: 冰片醇的高效生物合成：冰片醇作为一种重要的化学原料和药物在全世界范围内具有广泛的需求，目前高纯度的冰片醇的主要来源还是依赖于自然环境中提取，但随着近年来樟脑等树木资源的枯竭冰片醇的产量正在降低，因此我们希望可以借助酵母来实现冰片醇的大规模生产。（Efficient biosynthesis of Borneol:  Bornyl alcohol as a kind of important chemical raw material and drug has extensive worldwide demand， at present the main source of high purity of bornyl alcohol extracted or rely on the natural environment， but as in recent years， such as camphor trees resources drying up of bornyl alcohol yield is lower， so we hope that can be done with the help of yeast bornyl alcohol large-scale production. ）磁小体介导的癌症靶向治疗：趋磁细菌胞内合成的外被生物膜的磁性纳米粒子，成分为四氧化三铁或四硫化三铁，良好的铁磁性使其具有广阔的应用前景。 我们希望利用趋磁细菌生产的磁小体并进行改造以实现对癌细胞的定位并通过芬顿反应以实现癌细胞的杀伤（Targeted therapy of cancer mediated by magnetosomes: Magnetic nanoparticles of externally coated biofilm synthesized in the cells of magnetotactic bacteria， composed of ferric oxide or ferric sulfide， with good ferromagnetism， it has a broad application prospect.  We hope to take magnetosomes produced by magnetotactic bacteria and modify them to localize cancer cells and kill cancer cells by fenton reaction ）

Name: 中国农业大学
Title: 中文：护石传说 英文：COM ON
Abstract: 中文：石质文物是历史遗留给我们的珍贵物质文化遗产，许多露天石质文物至今仍在遭受着酸雨、盐腐蚀以及风化的侵蚀。位于杭州灵隐寺内的白塔，至今已有上千年的历史，但其上一些经文石刻仍然清晰完整，原因是其表面覆盖着一层天然形成的一水合草酸钙结晶薄膜起到了保护作用。CAU_China将利用合成生物学方法改造荧光假单胞菌2P24，使其能够用生物矿化的方法在文物表面产生致密的一水合草酸钙保护膜。我们将通过调控荧光假单胞菌2P24菌株的全局调控因子gacA和群体感应因子c-di-gmp使其大量产生胞外多糖，然后通过光信号控制obcAB和fpoar实现草酸的排出，排出的草酸离子就可以与岩石表层溶解以及外源添加的Ca2+结合，在文物表面形成致密的一水合草酸钙薄膜。英文：Stone cultural relics are precious material cultural heritage left to us by history. Many open-air stone cultural relics are still suffering from acid rain， salt corrosion and weathering erosion. The white Pagoda located in Hangzhou lingyin Temple has a history of more than one thousand years， but some of the stone carvings on it are still clear and intact， because its surface is covered with a layer of naturally formed calcium oxalate crystal film to protect it. CAU_China will use synthetic biological methods to modify Pseudomonas fluorescens 2P24 so that it can produce a dense protective film of calcium oxalate monohydrate on the surface of cultural relics by biological mineralization.We will regulate the global regulatory factor gacA and quorum sensing factor c-di-GMP of Pseudomonas fluorescein 2P24 to make it produce a large amount of extracellular polysaccharide， and then control obcAB and FPOAR by light signal to achieve oxalic acid excretion， so that the oxalate ions discharged can dissolve with the rock surface and combine with exogenous Ca2+. Finally， dense calcium oxalate monohydrate film is formed on the surface of cultural relics.

Name: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学基础医学院
Title: Whack-a-Mole: aim for a billion targets， strike with a giant hammer.
Abstract: 当我们在玩打地鼠游戏时，我们不断地拿着手里的小锤子去敲打它们，但它们总会从地鼠机的另一边冒出来，就像在肿瘤生长进化过程中不断诞生的新抗原一样。为了解决这一问题，我们设想并初步实践了一种基于抗体库技术的CAR-NK92库疗法。根据伯内特克隆选择学说，一个健康的成年人能产生针对所有抗原的抗体，其中也包括肿瘤抗原。我们大胆猜想：从健康人外周血中提取出的编码抗体的mRNA，经过阴性筛选后可以构造出抗体库，将抗体库装载至NK-92细胞表面形成的CAR-NK92库可以针对所有肿瘤抗原。这样的策略就像我们在玩打地鼠游戏时拿了一把巨大的锤子，这把锤子可以一次砸中所有的地鼠，让地鼠们无处可逃！为了有效控制细胞数量，我们效仿正常免疫细胞选择性克隆的现象，设计了基因回路，来达到这样的目的：识别到肿瘤抗原的CAR-NK92细胞允许增殖，其余细胞诱导凋亡。目前我们通过细胞实验证明了基因回路的可行性，下一步我们会对该疗法的体内杀瘤效果进行模拟。When we play Whac-a-Mole， we keep hitting them with our little hammers， but they always pop up on the other side of the machine， like neoantigens that are constantly  appearing as tumors grow and evolve. To address this problem， we conceived and preliminarily tested the CAR-NK92 library therapy based on antibody library technology. According to clonal selection theory， a healthy adult can produce antibodies against all antigens， including tumor antigens. We have a conjecture that mRNAs encoding antibodies extracted from the peripheral blood of healthy humans， can construct the antibody library after negative selection， and the CAR-NK92 library consisting of  NK-92 cells loading the antibody library can target all tumor antigens. This strategy is like playing Whac-a-Mole with a giant hammer that can strike all the moles simultaneously， leaving them nowhere to run! In order to control the cell population， we designed a genetic circuit to achieve the goal that CAR-NK92 cells that recognize tumor antigens are allowed to proliferate while the rest are induced apoptosis， emulating the selective cloning phenomenon of normal immune cells. We have now demonstrated the feasibility of the genetic circuit through cellular experiments， and our next step is to simulate the tumor-killing effect of the therapy in vivo.

Name: 中国药科大学
Title: molecular generation for DNA polymerase_theta
Abstract: Finding target molecules with specific chemical properties plays a decisive role in drug development. We proposed GEOM-CVAE， a constrained variational autoencoder based on geometric representation for molecular generation with specific properties， which is protein-context-dependent. In terms of machine learning， it includes continuous feature embedding encoder and molecular generation decoder. Our key contribution is to propose an efficient geometric embedding method， including the spatial structure representations of drug molecule (converting the 3-D coordinates into image) and the geometric graph representations of protein target (modeling the protein surface as a mesh). The 3-D geometric information is vital to successful molecular generation， which is different from previous molecular generative methods based on 1-D or 2-D. Our model framework generates specific molecules in two phases， by first generating special image with molecular 3-D information to learn latent representations and generating molecules with constrained condition based on geometric graph convolution for specific protein and then inputting the generated structural molecules into a parser network for obtaining Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System (SMILES) strings. Our model achieves competitive performance that implies its potential effectiveness to enable the exploration of the vast chemical space for drug discovery.

Name: 中国药科大学工学院
Title: 中文：可视化便携癌症早期初筛设备 英文：Convenient and readable equipment for multiple cancers detection
Abstract: 中文：2022 CPU-CHINA团队聚焦于多种癌症的初步筛查，旨在让医疗条件落后地区人群获得更多的健康保障。我们使用生信技术筛选出一种与20多种癌症的发生发展均存在高相关性的lncRNA分子，并为其设计了配套的检测系统。该系统操作简便且无需价格高昂的仪器，即可对人血液中的该lncRNA分子的表达进行定量检测。为检测者的患癌风险提供了极具参考意义的预示指标。英文：2022 CPU-CHINA team focuses on preliminary detection of various cancers， aiming to provide more health security to people in underdeveloped areas. We used bioinformatics to screen out a lncRNA molecule that is highly correlated with the occurrence and development of more than 20 kinds of cancers， and then designed a matching detection system for it. The system is easy to operate and does not require expensive instruments to quantitatively detect the expression of lncRNA in human blood. It provides a very meaningful indicator for predicting the risk of cancer.

Name: 中南大学生命科学学院
Title: 混合型sgRNA的CRISPR-Cas12a系统检测循环游离DNA来诊断包虫病、Diagnosing echinococcosis through multi-sgRNA bulletin of cell-free circulating DNA using CRISPR-Cas12a
Abstract: 我们设计了一个寄生虫病诊断系统，通过检测人体血液中的循环游离DNA (cfDNA)，以确定他们是否感染了寄生虫。使用重组酶聚合酶扩增(RPA)在血液中扩增cfDNA。然后利用扩增产物激活CRISPR-Cas12ａ系统的反式切割活性（旁切效应），切割我们设计合成的核酸探针。最后用胶体金试纸对切割产物进行检测。Our diagnostic system for parasitic diseases tests a person's cell-free Circulating DNA (cfDNA) in their blood to see if they are infected with the parasite. We used the Recombinase Polymerase Amplification（RPA）to amplify cfDNA in blood. Then the amplification product was used to activate the trans-cleavage activities of CRISPR-Cas12A system， cut the nucleic acid probe we designed and synthesized. Finally， the colloidal gold test papers were used to detect the cut product.

Name: 中山大学生命科学学院
Title: 原核生物抗性系统预测平台（Defense System Prediction Platform of Prokaryotes ， DS3P）
